title.value: UK Core Implementation Guide Assets In Development

description.value: This guide identifies those FHIR Assets that are in development and have not yet been through the UK Core Clinical and Technical Assurance process.

display.value: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

description.value: This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource AuditEvent.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource Bundle.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource CarePlan.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource CareTeam.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource Communication.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource Consent.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource Device.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource DocumentReference.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource EpisodeOfCare.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource Flag.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource ImagingStudy
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource MessageHeader.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource OperationOutcome.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource OrganizationAffiliation.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource Provenance.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource Questionnaire.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource QuestionnaireResponse.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource RequestGroup.
This profile defines the UK constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource Task.
An extension to reference a practitioner that recorded an event.

name.value: Extension UK Core Typed Date Time

description.value: This supports the exchange of dates and/or times. The extension date and/or time is carried along with a code to identify the type of date and/or time.
This supports the exchange of time periods. The extension time period is carried along with a code to identify whether the data is record for legal or operational periods.

A set of codes that define a reason to trigger an exception to a base policy, consisting of the entirety of the SNOMED CT UK Coding System. An exception can be an addition or removal of access permissions. This set of codes may not necessarily be complete or appropriate and may require further discussion in the future.
A ValueSet to identify the type of date and time being recorded.

A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a type of device. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Device Type' subset with subset original id 1361000000131; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Device type simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000401000000107.
A ValueSet to identify the type of period data being recorded.
CodeSystem to identify the type of date and time being recorded.
CodeSystem to identify the type of period data being recorded.
